metadata.title: CVE-2024-39466 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:thermal/drivers/qcom/lmh: Check for SCM availability at probeUp until now, the necessary scm availability check has not beenperformed, leading to possible null pointer dereferences (which didhappen for me on RB1).Fix that.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
